attributes.action: Restore Access to Public Toilets in Pymmes Park, Victoria Rd, London N18 2UG
attributes.additional_details:
The lack of functional toilets can lead to public health issues.
Ask for a maintenance plan to ensure they remain clean and functional
Well-maintained amenities improve the quality of public space and community morale.
The lack of facilities can make the park inaccessible to many.
Without toilets, people cut visits short or avoid the park altogether.
attributes.background:
People with health conditions, disabilities, or small children particularly need access to toilets.
The lack of facilities can make the park inaccessible to many.
Summer is getting closer and there is no access.
